_instructions:
Please expand this Quarex book seed into a complete book. Create as many chapters as necessary to cover the subject matter thoroughly. 
Within chapter: Create 4-8 Topics in form of questions that users can click to explore.
Each Topic should be a clear, curiosity-sparking question

seed.name: A History of Racism in the Americas

chapters.name: Before Race: How Europeans Invented Racial Categories
topics: Did concepts of 'race' exist before European colonization of the Americas?

chapters.name: The Genocide of Indigenous Peoples
topics: How many Indigenous people died in the first century after European contact?
